metadata.title: CVE-2017-14637 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In sam2p 0.49.3, there is an invalid read of size 2 in the parse_rgbfunction in in_xpm.cpp. However, this can also cause a write to an illegaladdress.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14637` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sam2p - 0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sam2p package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.14.04.1').
